Class WorldInterpreter.RunningProcess

java.lang.Object

Enclosing class:
WorldInterpreter
private class WorldInterpreter.RunningProcess
extends java.lang.Object
implements Listener, java.io.Serializable

Structure for remembering all parts of a running process.

dummyHook

private Hook dummyHook
Hook of the process' finish, which is no more planned. This remembers expired or canceled hooks for possible reuse.

The calendar hook cancel callback

Specified by:
canceled in interface Listener

destroy

public void destroy(ProcessResult result)
Finishes the process, cleans all registered callbacks.

Parameters:
result - Result of the finishing process

planFinish

public void planFinish()
Plans the finish of an atomic process to the calendar. The remaining time is queried inside. The process should have ATOMIC mode.

unplanFinish

public void unplanFinish()
Unplans the finish of an atomic process from the calendar.

updateLod

public void updateLod()
Check all actors and update process' lod

preIncreaseLod

public void preIncreaseLod()
Calls increaseLod before the actor's lod and process' mode actually change. This action is remembered to check it's validity later (in the time of physical lod change)

preDecreaseLod

public void preDecreaseLod()
Calls decreaseLod before the actor's lod and process' mode actually change. This action is remembered to check it's validity later (in the time of physical lod change)

changed

public void changed(Hook initiator)
The calendar hook callback

Specified by:
changed in interface Listener
Parameters:
initiator - origin of message
